com.st.st25sdk.command

Interface Iso14443bCommandInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Iso14443bCommand

    public interface Iso14443bCommandInterface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> anticollision_iso14443b()
      ISO14443-B anticollision method to detect one or more tags
      byte[] attriB(byte[] param)
      A PICC receiving an ATTRIB command with its identifier becomes selected and assigned to a dedicated channel After being selected, this PICC only responds to commands defined in the higher layer protocol which include its unique CID
      byte[] deselect()
      Function allowing to deselect tags.
      void hltB(byte[] identifier)
      hltB command as defined in iso14443-3 specification
      byte[] reqB(byte afi, byte param)
      reqB command as defined in iso14443-3 specification Send the ReqB command (command code 0x05)
      byte[] slotMarker(byte slotNumber)
      Slot Marker command as defined in iso14443-3 specification After a REQB/WUPB command, the PCB may send up to N-1 Slot-Marker commands to define the start of each slot
      byte[] wupB(byte afi, byte param)
      wupB command as defined in iso14443-3 specification Send the wupB command (command code 0x05)

    • Method Detail

      • reqB

        byte[] reqB(byte afi,
            byte param)
     throws STException
        reqB command as defined in iso14443-3 specification Send the ReqB command (command code 0x05)
        Parameters:
        afi - Application Family Identifier
        param - contains Extended ATQB supported, REQB/WUPB information, Slot number
        Returns:
        tag's response (atqB)
        Throws:
        STException

      • wupB

        byte[] wupB(byte afi,
            byte param)
     throws STException
        wupB command as defined in iso14443-3 specification Send the wupB command (command code 0x05)
        Parameters:
        afi - Application Family Identifier
        param - contains Extended ATQB supported, REQB/WUPB information, Slot number
        Returns:
        tag's response (atqB)
        Throws:
        STException

      • hltB

        void hltB(byte[] identifier)
   throws STException
        hltB command as defined in iso14443-3 specification
        Parameters:
        identifier - the value of the PUPI
        Throws:
        STException

      • slotMarker

        byte[] slotMarker(byte slotNumber)
           throws STException
        Slot Marker command as defined in iso14443-3 specification After a REQB/WUPB command, the PCB may send up to N-1 Slot-Marker commands to define the start of each slot
        Parameters:
        slotNumber - slot marker number (0x1=2 0x2=3 0xF=16)
        Returns:
        command's response
        Throws:
        STException

      • attriB

        byte[] attriB(byte[] param)
       throws STException
        A PICC receiving an ATTRIB command with its identifier becomes selected and assigned to a dedicated channel After being selected, this PICC only responds to commands defined in the higher layer protocol which include its unique CID
        Parameters:
        param - identifier / param 1 2 3 4 / High layer INF
        Returns:
        MBLI/CID High Layer Response
        Throws:
        STException

      • deselect

        byte[] deselect()
         throws STException
        Function allowing to deselect tags. Needed to release tags from NFC type4B world
        Returns:
        the received response
        Throws:
        STException

      • anticollision_iso14443b

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> anticollision_iso14443b()
                                                  throws STException
        ISO14443-B anticollision method to detect one or more tags
        Returns:
        array containing uid of detected tags (length of array indicate number of detected tags)
        Throws:
        STException
